title: Caged
description: Autumn's life, once that of a bird in a golden cage, has been irrevocably changed once more. The man she loves and hates, infamous crime lord Cage Zisgani, the man who can leave her quivering with a touch, has been arrested. And just how safe is Autumn when the man who has shielded her is caged far from her arms? Will she be able to survive the onslaught of his enemies? Or will she end up as a prisoner, or a casualty of war?But Cage is not the kind of man to idly sit back and let the world dictate his fate. And woe be to anyone, friend or foe, who gets between him and his woman, Autumn. Because behind his ice-blue eyes, behind his cold demeanor, lies a lethal will and a passion that burns hotter than the sun...
author: Timothy Terry
